stanza.line: So is it not with me as with that musemuse

Who heaven it self for ornament doth useuse
And every fair with his fair doth rehearserehearse
Making a couplement of proud comparecompare
With sun and moon with earth and sea rich gemsgems
With April first-born flowers and all things rarerare
That heaven air in this huge rondure hemshems
O let me true in love but truly writewrite
And then believe me my love is as fairfair
As any mother child though not so brightbright
As those gold candles fixed in heaven airair
Let them say more that like of hearsay wellwell
